00018 #ifndef GUARD_DELEGATES_ASSOCIATIVE_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 #define GUARD_DELEGATES_ASSOCIATIVE_HPP_INCLUDED 1
00020 
00021 #include "../DelegateN/DelegateBase.hpp"
00022 #include "AlgorithmExt.hpp"
00023 #include <functional>
00024 #include <map>
00025 
00026 namespace DL
00027 {
00028   template < class MapType >
00029     struct Deleter 
00030     {
00031       void operator()(typename MapType::value_type iter)
00032       { 
00033         delete (iter.second); 
00034       }
00035     };
00036   template< class KeyType , class Compare = std::less<KeyType> >
00037     class Associative
00038     {
00039     public:
00040       typedef Compare     compare_type;
00041       typedef KeyType     key_type;
00042       typedef typename std::map< key_type, DelegateBase* , compare_type > map_type;
00043     public:
00044     Associative(){}
00045     virtual ~Associative()
00046     {
00047       stdext::foreach(m_data,Deleter<map_type>());
00048     }
00049     void insert( key_type key , DelegateObj Callback )
00050     {
00051       m_data.insert(map_type::value_type(key,Callback.release()));
00052     }
00053     void emit(key_type key)
00054     {
00055       typename map_type::iterator iter;
00056       if((iter = m_data.find(key)) != m_data.end())
00057           iter->second->Invoke();
00058     }
00059   private:
00060   std::map< key_type , DelegateBase* , compare_type > m_data;
00061   };
00062 } // namespace DL
00063 #endif // GUARD_DELEGATES_ASSOCIATIVE_HPP_INCLUDED
